DOC.brief_summary: The aim of the study is to investigate the effect of Victoza (a GLP-1 receptor agonist)on insulin-dose, risk of hypoglycemia and gastric emptying rate during hypoglycemia in patients with type 1 diabetes.
DOC.brief_title: Effect of GLP-1 on Insulin-dose, Risk of Hypoglycemia and Gastric Emptying Rate in Patients With Type 1 Diabetes
DOC.criteria: age 1850y, BMI 1827, caucasian origin, type 1 diabetes diagnosed between age 5 and age 40, no known diabetes complications or cardiovascular diseases, no medication known to influence glucose homeostasis, no pregnancy diabetes complications, autonomous nerve dysfunction, anaemia, HbA1c < 8.5% at screening, estimated by the investigator to be incapable of completing the trial.
